title: Red Sox- Astros, NBA, & Thursday Night Football
itunes:title: Red Sox- Astros, NBA, & Thursday Night Football
description:
Colin discusses why umpire Joe West once again makes a bad call during the Red Sox-Astros game, why analytics is taking over star power, what to look for in the NBA this season, and his thoughts on the Thursday Night NFL game between the Broncos and the Cardinals. Guests include Chris Broussard, Greg Cosell, Nick Swisher, and T. J. Houshmandzadeh.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
